channel.title: A Sound
channel.description: Is there a command I can add that will play a sound on all connected users clients?

item.title: A Sound
item.dc:creator: @stewie0888 stewie0888
item.description:
@stewie0888 wrote:

I want to add a small sound to my client and have it play when i send the command. Because Im adding an account security system and i need it to play the sound

Read full topic

item.title: A Sound
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

[quote=“stewie0888, post:1, topic:322248”]Is there a command I can add that will play a sound on all connected users clients?[/quote]Most of that would be client-sided, unless it’s an already-in-game sound you want. And I’m not even sure if THAT’S server-sided.

Look through your client.java methods (that’s where everything’s at, eh? Stupid RSPS unorganization) and try to find one that looks like it’d play a sound. All I can suggest.

But, if you’re wanting to play a sound that’s on your computer, like music, you can’t do that unless you get everybody on your server to download the client with that sound file.

Read full topic
